class.rdfs:comment: A TV episode which can be part of a series or season.
class.rdfs:label: TVEpisode

schema:countryOfOrigin.rdfs:comment: The country of the principal offices of the production company or individual responsible for the movie or program.
schema:countryOfOrigin.rdfs:label: countryOfOrigin

schema:partOfTVSeries.rdfs:comment: The TV series to which this episode or season belongs.
schema:partOfTVSeries.rdfs:label: partOfTVSeries

schema:subtitleLanguage.rdfs:comment: Languages in which subtitles/captions are available, in [IETF BCP 47 standard format](http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47).
schema:subtitleLanguage.rdfs:label: subtitleLanguage

schema:titleEIDR.rdfs:comment:
An [EIDR](https://eidr.org/) (Entertainment Identifier Registry) [[identifier]] representing at the most general/abstract level, a work of film or television.

For example, the motion picture known as "Ghostbusters" has a titleEIDR of  "10.5240/7EC7-228A-510A-053E-CBB8-J". This title (or work) may have several variants, which EIDR calls "edits". See [[editEIDR]].

Since schema.org types like [[Movie]] and [[TVEpisode]] can be used for both works and their multiple expressions, it is possible to use [[titleEIDR]] alone (for a general description), or alongside [[editEIDR]] for a more edit-specific description.
schema:titleEIDR.rdfs:label: titleEIDR
